findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose a party to significant risks arising from breaches or third-party claims without any recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid could result in significant losses not being recoverable, especially in cases of gross negligence or willful misconduct.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may hinder the ability to verify compliance with the NDA, increasing the risk of undisclosed breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: An 18% late fee is considerably high and may lead to financial strain or disputes over payment obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: Late payments shall accrue interest at a rate of 18% per annum.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes regarding ownership or use of shared ideas and inventions.
